context: Each and every patriotic American should support a full investigation of why a former president illegally removed documents, including ones that if released would endanger Our national security, and refused repeatedly over 18 months to return all of them.

replies.context: There aren't any real patriots on Fox.  They like the name of it, but just like Republican, it's just a name for them, they don't align with actual Republican values but use the name, they are the true RINO's aka trumpsters.

context: I think the burning question here should be, “Who directed Thibault?” The FBI obviously has shown an apparent aversion in acting indepdendently., follow this to the top.
